alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Montgomery; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grimes, west central Montgomery and northeastern Waller Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Magnolia, or near Pinehurst, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conroe, Willis, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Panorama Village, Magnolia, Cut And Shoot, Montgomery, Woodloch, Todd Mission, Lake Conroe Dam, Dobbin and Plantersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
